article.title: Status and history for [009]
article.p: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Language is likely some variant of Mbundu (iso639 kmb). Thanks to Michael Cysouw and Philippe Verdy.
stage 4: http://gddc.pt/direitos-humanos/50anos-decl-univ-dh/kIMBUNDU.html identified as the source. XML contributed by Eric Muller.
